p: Drug formulations of herbals can be with the use of one drug extract or the use of two or more drug extracts. The latter is referred to as polyherbal formulations. Single plants may not attain the desirable therapeutic effects due to the inadequacy of its active phytochemical constituents. However, polyherbals in combined ratios of multiple herbs, may give an enhanced therapeutic effect and decrease the toxicity ( Karole etÂ al., 2019). Therefore, adopting lower doses of more than one herb may exhibit improved safety ( Benzie and Wachtel-Galor, 2011).
